summary: Client requested that Sarah start a vision meeting. The PM asked for a project name while Architect, Developer, and QA provided no comments (marked not_addressed).

actions.task: Start the vision meeting and propose a project name and draft agenda for stakeholder review

risks.risk: Key technical and QA stakeholders did not provide input (not_addressed), risking misalignment on scope and requirements.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with the architect, developer, and QA to collect input before the meeting; circulate a clear agenda and proposed project name; assign roles and deadlines for pre-meeting prep.
